content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Datahub is a flexible and open ecosystem of functional, integration and data services for EPAM enterprise applications to simplify their design, development and operations as well as reduce time-to-market of new capabilities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Read more about the system in article \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/otPAL\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Datahub\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and how access is granted in article \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/fGRcL\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Granting access to Datahub topics\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
